definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to send/to give as a present
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
to show deference or praise publicly

sentences.chinese: 吉姆靠给人擦皮鞋为生。

sentences.english: That good for nothing never sends any money to his poor mother.
sentences.chinese: 那个没用的家伙，从不给他可怜的母亲送钱。

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天过得很棒，但我在水里把自己给晒伤了。

sentences.english: This will be a document that you give to a tester.
sentences.chinese: 这样就会形成你给测试者的一个文件。

sentences.english: First impressions of Sumatra are not good.
sentences.chinese: 苏门答腊给我的第一印象并不好。

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多秘密不能随便说给妻子听。

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳达到达后给我打了电话，因而我知道她平安无事。

sentences.english: Yes, we can let you have a single room.
sentences.chinese: 有，我们能给您一间单人房住。

sentences.english: Look at my feet, grandma frozen stiff decided to make a pair of cloth padded boots.
sentences.chinese: 看着我冻僵的小脚，奶奶决定给我做一双布棉鞋。

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，电子书籍可以出售给你30元的前景。

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: After that, people call on their relatives, friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，人们给亲戚，朋友和邻居拜年。

sentences.english: No problem is permanent storms always give way to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 风暴总会给阳光让路，寒冬总会转变为暖春。

sentences.english: Boy stole a lesson-book from one of his school-fellows and took it home to his Mother.
sentences.chinese: 有个男孩偷了同学的一本教科书，带回家给母亲。

sentences.english: Someone has stolen your treasure box.
sentences.chinese: 有人把你的珠宝盒给偷走了。

sentences.english: He was supposed to give us advice, but this ideas were airy-fairy ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他应该给我们提些劝告，但他的主意都是不切实际的。

definition: to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to send/to give as a present
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to leave behind/to stay behind/to remain/to keep/not to let (sb) go
